title: [Health] Study on the effect of extended space flight on astronauts’ brains found an increase in the perivascular spaces within the brains of first-time astronauts, but no difference among astronauts who previously served aboard the space station: “Experienced ones may have reached some kind of homeostasis”
[Medicine] Targeted epigenomic editing ameliorates adult anxiety and excessive drinking after adolescent alcohol exposure (in rats)
